Uses of Package
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button

Packages that use org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button
Package
Description
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button
This package contains the additional widget annotations and classes to define widgets which trigger certain actions.
  • Classes in org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button used by org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button
    Class
    Description
    ButtonActionHandler
    The interface defining that a ButtonWidget.actionHandler() has to extend.
    ButtonChange
    This class exists in order to communicate what changes should be made to a button component after a call to a ButtonActionHandler or a ButtonUpdateHandler.
    ButtonState
    An interface used to defining the underlying state machine of the action handler within a ButtonWidget.
    ButtonUpdateHandler
    A handler for updating the button state when another setting changes its value.
    CancelableActionHandler.States
